entry.em: ..TORNADO WATCH 43 IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING

entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE WITH DAMAGING WINDS, LARGE HAIL, AND TORNADOES
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE WITH DAMAGING WINDS, LARGE HAIL, AND TORNADOES IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
COOLER
LESS HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
